pages.title: Hemophiliac Compass
pages.text: The <item>Hemophiliac Compass/$ allows tracking other players or mobs given a <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/syringe#blood)blood sample/$. Hold the <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/syringe#blood)blood sample/$ in the offhand, and the compass needle will point towards the target if they're in the same dimension. If they're in another dimensions, the needle will wobble randomly.$(br2)The <item>$(l:essentials:witchcraft/syringe#blood)blood sample/$ won't work once it's $(l:essentials:witchcraft/spoilage)spoiled/$.$(br2)The compass also won't track players who are logged out or mobs in unloaded chunks.$(br2)
